Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2018 08:29AM Mirka80 wrote: Maaaki it is very interesting what did you write about your treatment. My mom, living in Czech Republic is stage IV with peritonei carcinomatosis, probably spread from breast after 10 years of NED. She is on faslodex.for 3 years only. It seems that there will be some progression as TM are growing. We still wait hovewer there is only one option to follow -chemo. Ibrance is not yet approved by insurance companies i our country. She is ER+ PR+ HER -. I expect that this private clinic is not for free or how did you get there for cure? It is suitable for any pacient? We have a meeting with MO in 2 weeks and we will see next step. I am searching for any opportunity.
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL
